snippet: Stung by criticism of its leadership, the museum's board has decided the institution needs a curatorial leader in addition to a director.
abstract: Stung by criticism of its leadership, the museum's board has decided the institution needs a curatorial leader in addition to a director.

headline.main: Reversing Course,  Los Angeles Art Museum Will Look for Chief Curator
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Museum, in Switch, to Seek Curator
